title: New developments in the Whizard event generator
authors:
J\"urgen Reuter, Pia Bredt, Marius H\"ofer, Wolfgang Kilian, Nils
  Kreher, Maximilian L\"oschner, Krzysztof M\k{e}ka{\l}a, Thorsten Ohl, Tobias
  Striegl, Aleksander Filip \.Zarnecki
abstract:
We give a status report on new developments within the Whizard event
generator. Important new features comprise NLO electroweak automation (incl.
extension to BSM processes like SMEFT), loop-induced processes and new
developments in the UFO interface. We highlight work in progress and further
plans, such as the implementation of electroweak PDFs, photon radiation, the
exclusive top threshold and features for exotic new physics searches.
